sense.name: open the lock of; return from a locked state
sense.commentary: Syntax includes: NP1[instrument] UNLOCK NP2[concrete] NP1[agent] UNLOCK NP2[concrete]
sense.examples: She unlocked the window and opened it. Unlock the door so Byron can come in. If you buy a used cell phone, make sure the seller unlocks it first. You need your PIN number to unlock your account.

sense.name: set free or release
sense.commentary: syntax includes: NP1[concrete] UNLOCK NP2[abstract] NP1[abstract] UNLOCK NP2[abstract]
sense.examples: His voice unlocked her hidden feelings. A desire was unlocked in her after the encounter.
